channel.title: Full data feed
channel.description: This is the main feed for your online product data for Google Shopping and should be submitted at least every 30 days.

item.title: 1/2 Oz. Square Shakers with Chrome Tops, 12 Pieces
item.description: A standard dining room staple, this square shaker is perfect for adding flavor to your table. It features a stylish glass base paired with a polished chrome-plated top for a simple yet attractive look, blending in with nearly any table setting. Just the right size for a table with limited space, this shaker holds a half ounce of seasoning, making it suitable for dispensing the desired consistency with ease. It can also be used as a convenient bar top addition for those eating at the bar and a fun party favor for a variety of occasions from baby showers and bridal showers to engagement parties and weddings.

item.title: 1/2 Oz. Square Shakers with Brass Tops, 12 Pieces
item.description: Ideal for salt and pepper, this square glass shaker is perfect for any classic and casual tabletop and looks great on individual place settings. It features a stylish glass jar paired with a brass top for a charming look. Just the right size for a table with limited space, hold a half-ounce of salt, pepper, or any of your favorite herbs and spices and homemade seasonings to add to your favorite dish. This shaker's mini size makes it suitable for dispensing the desired consistency with ease. It can also be used as a convenient bar top addition for those eating at the bar and a fun party favor for a variety of occasions from baby showers and bridal showers to engagement parties and weddings.

item.title: 1 Oz. Glass Paneled Shakers with Chrome Mushroom Tops, 12 Pieces
item.description: Complement any table setting with this 1-ounce mushroom top square shaker. A great shaker for salt and pepper and other cooking ingredients, add a dash of your favorite seasoning to any food. A rounded panel base provides stable footing for this tasteful tabletop piece. This shaker also features a bright chrome-plated top for a nice sheen on your tabletop.

item.title: 2 Oz. Glass Paneled Shakers with Chrome Mushroom Tops, 12 Pieces
item.description: Complement any table setting with this 2-ounce mushroom top square shaker. A great shaker for salt and pepper and other cooking ingredients, add a dash of your favorite seasoning to any food. A rounded panel base provides stable footing for this tasteful tabletop piece. This shaker also features a bright chrome-plated top for a nice sheen on your tabletop.

item.title: 2 Oz. Glass Square Shakers with Chrome Mushroom Tops, 12 Pieces
item.description: Complement any table setting with this 2-ounce mushroom top square shaker. A great shaker for salt and pepper and other cooking ingredients, add a dash of your favorite seasoning to any food. Not too big and not too small, this glass shaker is perfect for table placement and condiment caddies.

item.title: 1 Oz. Glass Tower Shakers with Chrome Tops, 12 Pieces
item.description: Looking for another way to impress your hungry guests? The slim and elegant tower design of this 1-ounce glass shaker will do the trick. Its stylish stainless steel top will help release just the right amount of salt or pepper with each shake, making all of your meals delicious.

item.title: 1 Oz. Glass Tower Shakers with Brass Tops, 12 Pieces
item.description: Add a touch of strikingly designed simplicity to your table with this conveniently sized sleek 1-ounce shaker. Ideal for casual breakfast, lunch, and dinner settings, the classic glass tower design and perforated brass top are the perfect serving accents. Also functional in upscale restaurants, weddings, banquets, and hotels, this shaker blends in with a variety of decor and makes for an elegant presentation of various condiments.

item.title: 3 Oz. Glass Paneled Shakers with Chrome Mushroom Tops, 12 Pieces
item.description: Simple and economical, this uniquely designed paneled glass shaker is a tabletop must-have that can be used to dispense salt or pepper and other condiments. Featuring a clear container and a chrome top with universal holes to portion just the right amount of seasoning to each meal, its 3-ounce capacity is conveniently the perfect volume allowing for fewer refills between uses.

item.title: 2 Oz. Glass Classic Shaker with Chrome Flat Tops, 12 Pieces
item.description: Complement your kitchen with this impressive classic shaker, which looks great on any traditional table setting. Designed with a glass base, a convenient 2-ounce capacity, and a stainless steel flat top for a simple and economical design, this shaker is perfect for adding zest to a variety of foods in precise condiment amounts. Ideal for filling your choice of salt, pepper, or any flavorful spice, use it for a quick seasoning.

item.title: 10 Oz. Stainless Steel Gravy Boat
item.description: This sculptural server provides an elegant presentation for your favorite sauces, gravies and dressings. With its 8 ounce capacity and tapered spout, guests can pour chocolate over their dessert. Crafted from commercial-grade stainless steel, it will resist rust and corrosion and will not chemically react with acidic food, perfect for serving citrus-infused vinaigrettes. Designed to pair well with a variety of tableware and linens, the high polished mirror-finish of this gravy boat will elevate any table setting.

item.title: 10 Oz. Stainless Steel Bell Creamer
item.description: Guests will appreciate the charming silhouette this 10-ounce stainless steel bell creamer has to offer. A sturdy, ergonomic handle enables easy pouring and serving. The round, tapered drip-free spout ensures a smooth consistent pour. With its mirror-finished stainless steel construction, this creamer pitcher is resistant to rust and corrosion and will not chemically react with acidic food or liquid. This creamer can be used as an espresso pourer from an espresso machine. With its style, durability and practicality, this creamer adds a touch of elegance to any table setting.

item.title: 4 Piece Professional Butter Warmer Set
item.description: Melt butter while keeping its creamy consistency using this butter warmer. Ideal for creating the ultimate dipping mixture for meaty lobster or for a firm haddock fish fillet, the butter warmer provides the convenience of consistent melted butter without having to interrupt dinner to reheat butter. The set includes a stand, a butter cup, a candle holder and a candle.

item.title: 11-3/4" x 7-7/8" Stainless Steel Oval Serving Platter
item.description: Entertaining on a grand scale necessitates use of this elegant mirror-finish serving platter. Lay an arrangement of small bites, fresh sliced fruits or desserts on this platter for a polished presentation. Sculpted from commercial-grade stainless steel, this serving platter is made to resist rust and corrosion and will not chemically react with acidic food. This serving platter is available in three different sizes to accommodate any size gathering.

item.description: Entertaining on a grand scale necessitates use of this elegant mirror-finish serving platter. item.title: 4 Oz. BPA-Free Rustic Fiesta Molcajete Salsa Bowls, 4 Pack
item.description: A finely crafted tool for specific purposes, most authentic Mexican recipes will call for this 4-ounce molcajete salsa bowl. Available in various sizes, these bowls are crafted from BPA-free polypropylene and are break-resistant and dishwasher safe. Featuring a traditional shape, these rustic salsa servers are also perfect for holding guacamole, chips, salads, and more, adding a true cultural touch to any tabletop.

item.title: 10 Oz. BPA-Free Rustic Fiesta Molcajete Salsa Bowls, 4 Pack
item.description: A finely crafted tool for specific purposes, most authentic Mexican recipes will call for this 10-ounce molcajete salsa bowl. Available in various sizes, these bowls are crafted from BPA-free polypropylene and are break-resistant and dishwasher safe. Featuring a traditional shape, these rustic salsa servers are also perfect for holding guacamole, chips, salads, and more, adding a true cultural touch to any tabletop.

item.title: 8-1/2" BPA-Free Tortilla Warmer
item.description: Serve tortillas like a professional in this tortilla warmer. Place your tortillas in the warmer to keep them hot and fresh for your guests during the party. Homemade pancakes or waffles fit easily inside the warmer for a better brunch. Made of a durable plastic, this lightweight russet brown tortilla warmer will add a rustic flair to any table setting.

item.title: 1-2 Slot Stainless Steel Taco Holder
item.description: A fiesta favorite, keep both crunchy and soft tacos from toppling over by using this taco holder. Give guests the option to enjoy one or two tacos by simply flipping the holder to accommodate their needs. The stainless steel construction will resist rust and corrosion, making it perfect for outdoor barbeques. Available in three different sizes, each side of the taco holder holds a different amount of tacos.

item.title: 2-3 Slot Stainless Steel Taco Holder
item.description: This taco holder will keep both soft and crunchy tacos from toppling over and spilling out their contents. Use it to hold tacos upright as your guests choose their own toppings. Constructed from stainless steel, this taco holder is rust and corrosion resistant, making it perfect for outdoor use to hold and serve hot dogs as guests dress them. This taco holder is available in three different sizes to fit your needs.

item.title: 4-5 Slot Stainless Steel Taco Holder
item.description: Your Cinco De Mayo buffet table needs this taco holder. Capable of holding 4 to 5 tacos, this holder will keep tacos, crunchy or soft, upright so guests can choose their favorite toppings and enjoy their meal without having the contents of their carefully crafted tacos spill onto the table. Made of stainless steel, this taco holder will resist rust and corrosion, making it ideal for outdoor parties. Available in three different sizes, these taco holders are great to use as dinnerware as well as a serving piece.

item.title: Brown Rectangular Poly Woven Basket with Handles, 12" x 8" x 3"
item.description: Serve anything from muffins and dinner rolls to pastries and fruit, deliver a decorative basket of treats, nicely display soaps, or store household products in this rectangular natural woven basket. An everyday staple, this basket is a great addition to any home. The reinforced weaving on the rim and base provides added durability and the two carrying handles are great for support. This basket is easily stackable and can be cleaned by wiping down or tossing into the dishwasher. Available in two sizes for your convenience, choose the one that suits your needs.

item.title: 12" Stainless Steel Service Tray
item.description: This sleek mirror-finish stainless steel serving tray offers a whimsical flair with its charming satin swirl pattern. Use this versatile tray to complement your bar tools or to serve guests signature cocktails during your next dinner party. Line this tray with a doily and serve appetizers and small bites in style. Available in three different sizes, this mirror-finish stainless steel tray can meet all of your different serving and décor needs. This tray features a highly polished edge and satin swirl pattern that can easily be incorporated into your home décor.

item.title: 2 Qt. Clear Polycarbonate Square Storage Container with Graduation Markings
item.description: Ideal for the storage and transport of both raw and cooked food, this 2-quart square food storage container is a handy kitchen essential. Crafted from clear polycarbonate plastic, it is break-resistant and extremely durable. It can withstand temperatures from -40 degrees Fahrenheit to 210 degrees Fahrenheit, allowing it to be used in both refrigerators and freezers. Featuring built-in handles with color graduations on the outside in liters and quarts for accurate measuring, this container takes the guesswork out of proper portioning. For added convenience, this food storage container is dishwasher safe. Available in multiple sizes, choose the one to suit your kitchen needs. Use the corresponding lid to preserve the freshness of the products you store in this particular container.

item.description:

item.description: An essential for pizza servings, one item that's always a necessity is this sturdy pizza cutter. Solid and well-built, this pizza cutters wooden handle provides a comfortable grip. Built with professional in mind, the blade is designed to remain vibrant even after regular repeated use. Avoid putting in dishwasher due to the wooden handle and use a wood conditioner periodically for optimal longevity. The handle also features a built-in safety guard that keeps fingers away from the blade.

item.title: 6 Piece Stainless Steel Cheese Knife Set with Bakelite Handles
item.description: Elevate your next wine and cheese gathering with this gourmet cheese knife set. In this complete six-piece set, there are knives for hard, soft, firm and crumbly cheese. Spread creamy Brie on a piece of a French baguette with the curved knife. Slice into a block of Bleu cheese to enjoy with some red wine using the knife with a forked tip. The three pointed-end knives can be designated for use with their own individual cheeses. Use the two-prong cheese knife to serve delicate slices of semi-hard and hard cheese. The blade of each knife in this set is made from commercial-grade stainless steel to resist rust and corrosion. Made from a durable plastic, the handle on each knife sits comfortably in the palm of the hand and is easy to hold.
item.g:product_type: Kitchen Tools > Specialty Tools > Cheese Tools

item.title: 6 Piece Wooden Handle Stainless Steel Cheese Knife Set
item.description: A perfect collection for any cheese lover, this beautiful set of wooden handle cheese knives is an essential for entertaining. Each knife features a stainless steel blade that is specially crafted to complement every type of cheese. The collection includes a semi-heart shaped blade made for slicing hard cheese, a curved shaped blade perfect for spreading soft cheese, a wide blade to slice and serve semi-hard and crumbly cheese, a thin blade for semi-hard cheese and a cheese fork for serving a variety of cheeses. Constructed from commercial-grade stainless steel to resist rust and corrosion, the rounded handles are easy to hold and sit comfortably in the palm of your hand. Pair this set with your gourmet charcuterie board to add a charming rustic touch.
item.g:product_type: Kitchen Tools > Specialty Tools > Cheese Tools

item.title: 3-1/2" Triple-Riveted Paring Knife with Fully Forged Full Tang German Steel Blade
item.description: This small paring knife is a kitchen essential that carves and peels small fruits and vegetables with ease and is the ideal tool for any handheld cutting task. Forged from a single piece of high-carbon German steel, the full tang heat-treated blade extends through the polymer handle and is triple-riveted for durability and control. Meticulously crafted to offer optimal weight distribution, this knife rests comfortably in the palm of the hand and delivers exceptional performance.

item.title: 5" Triple-Riveted Utility Knife with Fully Forged Full Tang German Steel Blade
item.description: A fundamental tool every professional chef must have, this utility knife is designed to handle many small handheld cutting tasks allowing you to cut, trim, and peel apples, kiwis, and onions with ease. Use this utility knife for larger cutting tasks such as trimming the fat off of meat or filleting delicate pieces of fish. The heat-treated blade is precisely forged from a single piece of high-carbon German steel that resists rust and corrosion and delivers exceptional performance. Featuring a triple-riveted contoured polymer handle for added durability and control, this utility knife is meticulously crafted for optimal weight balance.

item.title: 6" Triple-Riveted Chef's Knife with Fully Forged Full Tang German Steel Blade
item.description: An essential cutlery tool in any kitchen, this 6” chef’s knife is ideal for preparing several meals, from trimming fruits and vegetables to slicing and dicing meat, poultry, and fish. Perfect for a wide variety of cutting tasks, the heat-treated blade offers efficient slicing, dicing, mincing, and chopping. A fully forged tang is crafted from a single piece of high-carbon German steel that resists rust and corrosion and allows the blade to stay sharper longer. The durable polymer handle is contoured for a comfortable grip and reinforced with three rivets to provide exceptional control. This professional-grade chef’s knife is meticulously crafted for optimal weight balance to rest comfortably in the palm of the hand and offer excellent cutting precision.

item.title: 6" Triple-Riveted Boning Knife with Fully Forged Full Tang German Steel Blade
item.description: Deboning meat, filleting fish, or butter flying poultry all require the proper tool for the task. Create delicate fish fillets like a pro with this professional-grade 6” boning knife. Featuring an ultra sharp blade, this boning knife easily and efficiently slides between the meat and bone separating the two effortlessly. The heat-treated blade is forged from a single piece of high-carbon German stainless steel tang that resists rust and corrosion and delivers exceptional performance. Meticulously crafted for optimal weight balance, this boning knife rests comfortably in the palm of the hand and offers excellent control.

item.title: 7" Triple-Riveted Carving Fork with Fully Forged Full Tang German Steel Tines
item.description: Ease the task of slicing and carving large poultry and pieces of meat with the proper tools. Pair this carving fork with a slicer knife or chef’s knife from the collection for perfectly even slices of meat. Gently pierce the roast or ham with the long, curved tines to secure the roast and avoid a mess as you carve. This carving fork can also be used as a serving piece to dish up delectable slices of meat for your guests. Fully forged from a single piece of high-carbon German steel that resists rust and corrosion and triple-riveted for added durability, the tang extends through the heat-resistant polymer handle. Meticulously crafted for optimal weight balance, this serving fork rests safely and comfortably in the palm of the hand.

item.title: 8" Triple-Riveted Slicer with Fully Forged Full Tang German Steel Blade
item.description: A standout during the holiday season, use this slicer to carve and slice poultry, fish, and meat. The ultra sharp blade cuts through tough exteriors effortlessly and delivers even slices every time. Meticulously crafted for optimal weight balance, this slicer offers excellent control and the heat-treated blade provides prime sharpness and delivers exceptional performance. Forged from a single piece of high-carbon German steel, the full tang extends through the polymer handle and is triple-riveted for added durability. For convenience and safety, this slicer can be paired with the carving fork to hold foods securely in place while slicing.

item.title: 8" Triple-Riveted Bread Knife with Fully Forged Full Tang German Steel Blade
item.description: This serrated bread knife is the greatest thing since, well, sliced bread. Whether your homemade loaves turn out crispy or doughy, this serrated bread knife glides effortlessly through without squeezing the delicate interior. The heat-treated blade is precisely forged from a single piece of high-carbon German steel that resists rust and corrosion and delivers exceptional performance. Featuring a triple-riveted contoured polymer handle for added durability and control, this bread knife is meticulously crafted for optimal weight balance.

item.title: 8" Triple-Riveted Offset Bread Knife with Fully Forged Full Tang German Steel Blade
item.description: Whether you are slicing a fresh homemade loaf of bread or cutting into a ripe tomato, the offset bread knife glides through effortlessly for the cleanest cut. The offset handle provides optimal leverage and keeps the knuckles out of harm’s way. The heat-treated blade is forged from a single piece of high-carbon German stainless steel tang that resists rust and corrosion and delivers exceptional performance. The tang extends through the contoured handle and is triple-riveted added durability and control. Meticulously crafted for optimal weight balance, this offset bread knife rests comfortably in the palm of the hand and offers excellent control.

item.title: 14" Premium Round Magnetic Sharpening Steel
item.description: Whether you are carving a Thanksgiving turkey or slicing a tomato into fine slivers, you'll need a sharp knife to complete the task. This premium sharpening steel is the ideal tool to hone and realign the knife’s edge quickly and efficiently. The magnetic core of this sharpening steel attracts shavings during the honing process, preventing any loose debris from sticking to the knives and possibly contaminating the food. Ergonomically designed, the oversized handle protects hands while sharpening and comes equipped with a metal loop to hang for convenient storage.

item.title: 14" Sharpening Steel
item.description: Maintain the sharpness of your knife’s blade by using this stainless steel sharpening steel. The ideal tool for straight-edged kitchen knives, this sharpening steel can also be used to maintain hunting knives and switch blades. This sharpening steel is equipped with an oversized handle that fits comfortably in the hand and protects during the sharpening process. The handle also features a metal loop to hang for convenient storage.

item.title: Cleaver with 3-1/2" x 8" Blade and Wooden Handle
item.description: A workhorse in any kitchen, this heavy-duty meat cleaver is an ideal tool for every home cook. The thick, wide blade splits bones and separates joints in one swift motion. Use the flat side of the blade to crush garlic or seeds before chopping them up. The 8” stainless steel blade is fully forged and extends through the wooden handle and is reinforced by three rivets to ensure durability. This professional-grade heavy duty meat cleaver is meticulously crafted for the optimal weight balance. Chop and cube large pieces of meat effortlessly, then use the wide blade to scoop the ingredients off the board and into the pan. The wooden handle not only offers an ergonomic grip; it also adds an authentic butcher appeal.

item.title: Commercial-Grade Chinese Cleaver with 8-1/4" x 3-15/16" Blade and Steel Handle
item.description: Reduce prep time of large fruits and vegetables with this commercial-grade Chinese cleaver. Sleek and sophisticated, this commercial-grade Chinese cleaver has a wide, thin razor-sharp blade to seamlessly chop cabbage, squash, and watermelon into smaller pieces or slice into boneless meat while the flat edge of the blade can be used to crush garlic and seeds before mincing. This commercial-grade Chinese cleaver is meticulously crafted for optimal weight balance to reduce hand fatigue and provide greater control. The steel handle is molded to ensure a safe and comfortable grip while chopping, slicing, dicing, and mincing ingredients.

item.title: Commercial-Grade Chinese Cleaver with 8" x 2-1/4" Blade and Steel Handle
item.description: Razor-sharp cutlery is essential to every kitchen for efficient food prep. This stainless steel commercial-grade Chinese cleaver has a straight, thin blade to stay in constant contact with food as you cut, chop, and slice. The edge can be used to crush garlic, seeds, and herbs before mincing. This commercial-grade Chinese cleaver features a perfect weight balance to help reduce hand fatigue and provide greater control for precise cuts. Ergonomically designed, the molded handle ensures comfort while chopping, slicing, dicing and mincing ingredients.

item.title: Chinese Cleaver with 8" x 3-1/2" Blade and Wooden Handle
item.description: A great multitasking tool to mince large amounts of garlic for a marinade or slice thin cuts of chicken breast to saute for a fajita, this Chinese cleaver is essential for several cooking tasks. The wide, razor-sharp blade delivers thin, delicate cuts while the spine is used to tenderize meats and bring out the finest flavor. The knife can be turned on its side to crush garlic and ginger and to release essential oils for a bold, tasty seasoning and the wide blade is ideal for scooping ingredients off the board and transferring to the pot or pan with ease. This professional-grade cleaver is meticulously crafted for the ultimate weight balance to reduce hand fatigue and provide greater control. The round grooved wooden handle is not only stylish and offers authenticity to the Chinese cleaver; it also offers grip and comfort during food prep.

item.title: Chinese Cleaver with 7" x 2" Blade and Wooden Handle
item.description: Slice through carrots, potatoes and squash with ease using this wooden handle vegetable cleaver. The exceptional, razor-sharp blade is designed to slice, dice, mince and chop fruits and vegetables with precision. This professional-grade vegetable cleaver is meticulously crafted for the ultimate weight balance to reduce hand fatigue and provide greater control. The round, wooden handle has etched grooves to not only add style, but to offer a comfortable grip while preparing food.

item.title: Combination Sharpening Stone, Fine/Medium Grain, 8" x 2" x 1"
item.description: A dull knife in the kitchen can easily ruin any meal. Extend the life of the knife by using our combination sharpening stone. Coat each side with mineral oil to lubricate the knife, creating a slick, slippery surface easing the sharpening process. Use the medium grain side first to remove surface material from the blades edge, then smooth and sharpen the edge with the fine grit side. This compact-size combination sharpening stone is perfect to sharpen smaller or thinner knives such as the paring knife, utility knife and the boning knife. Keep one stocked in your drawers for convenient access. Requires mineral oil for use.

item.title: Combination Sharpening Stone, Fine/Medium Grain, 12" x 2-1/2" x 1-1/2"
item.description: Maximize the performance of your knives by properly maintaining the edge of the knife using the sharpening stone. The large surface is ideal for sharpening and maintaining larger knives such as chef knives, carving knives and even meat cleavers. Coat each side with mineral oil to lubricate the knife, creating a slick, slippery surface easing the sharpening process. First use the medium grain side, to remove dull surfaces or nicks, and then smooth the blade on the fine grain side. This combination sharpening stone works well with stainless steel and high-carbon German steel knives. Requires mineral oil for use.

item.title: Dual-Stage Ergonomic Soft Grip Knife Sharpener
item.description: Sharpen dull and nicked knives quickly and efficiently with this handheld dual-stage knife sharpener. The coarse carbide steel blades remove nicks and sharpen, while the ceramic rods smooth and hone the blade. This handheld dual-stage knife sharpener is ideal for a full range of kitchen cutlery and household, pocket, and fish knives. The ergonomic soft-grip handle and non-skid base are designed for added comfort and stability while sharpening knives and the compact size makes for convenient storage in any drawer.

item.title: 12" Magnetic Knife Holder, Wooden Base
item.description: Create an efficient work space by mounting this wooden magnetic knife bar on the wall to store cutlery safely above your countertop and within hand’s reach. item.title: 10-1/2" Heat-Resistant Flat Blade Silicone Spatula
item.description: Perfect for purees, batters, and sauces, this heavy-duty scraper is an excellent all-purpose cooking and baking tool. It features a cool-touch perforated handle and an over-molded flat silicone blade with a sharp edge for reaching into the bottom corners and crevices of bowls, jars, and containers for efficient scraping of foods. With high-heat capability, this scraper can withstand temperatures of up to 600 degrees Fahrenheit, making it ideal for all of your hot temperature cooking and baking needs. The flexible silicone blade construction provides effortless gliding across non-stick coated surfaces, preventing scratching and peeling of pots, pans, bowls, and bakeware. Offered in three different lengths, this versatile spatula is also perfect for scooping material and spreading layers, making it a useful utensil for any cook.

item.description: With this 28 ounce stainless steel cocktail shaker, there will be plenty of margarita to go around! Owning a cocktail shaker is a must for backyard barbeques or indoor soirees. Complete with three pieces, simply pour ingredients into the shaker over ice, place the tight seal cap on top and shake away like a professional bartender. Easily pour out the cocktail while the built in strainer holds back the ice, creating the perfect martini. The durable stainless steel construction will keep cocktails chilled until ready to be served. The sleek round shape is ideal for any modern bar.
item.g:product_type: Glassware & Bar > Bar & Wine Tools > Cocktail Shakers

item.description: This stainless steel 3-piece bar shaker set evokes the classic style of speakeasies. Constructed from high-polished stainless steel, this classic shaker can be used as a serving piece, keeping cocktails chilled until serving. The classic design of this bar shaker is a staple barware piece.

item.title: Chrome Winged Corkscrew
item.description: There is no easier way to open a bottle of wine then with this winged corkscrew wine opener. Simply position the corkscrew over a bottle of wine, twist the top handle to raise the geared winged levers and then push the levers down to extract the cork. Crafted in Italy to meet the professional sommelier's standards, this winged corkscrew wine opener has a plastic ring on the corkscrew's underside to protect the glass rim of the wine bottle for safe and easy cork removal. The top of the winged corkscrew doubles as a cap lifter, making this item ideal for opening chilled beer or glass soda bottles.
item.g:product_type: Glassware & Bar > Bar & Wine Tools > Bottle Openers & Accessories

item.title: Stainless Steel Waiter's Corkscrew
item.description: Wine bars and fine restaurants prefer this sleek stainless steel waiter's corkscrew. A sturdy lever and the small foil knife make opening bottles of wine a stress-free task. Equipped with a cap lifter, this corkscrew can also pop caps off of chilled beer bottles or old-fashioned soda bottles with ease. Crafted in Italy to meet the standards of sommeliers, this corkscrew is an extraordinary gift for your favorite wine aficionado or ultimate party host.
item.g:product_type: Glassware & Bar > Bar & Wine Tools > Bottle Openers & Accessories

item.title: Black Waiter's Corkscrew
item.description: Effortlessly open bottles of wine using this stylish black waiter's corkscrew. This all-in-one wine opener features a foil knife, a stainless steel corkscrew and a cap lifter. Crafted in Italy, this corkscrew is built to professional standards, making it durable enough to withstand everyday use. Use the cap lifter to crack open a frosty brew or pop open an old-fashioned soda bottle. For convenient storage, close up the corkscrew to create a compact size accessory, great for on the go. Keep one handy for convenience or gift one to your favorite wine aficionado.
item.g:product_type: Glassware & Bar > Bar & Wine Tools > Bottle Openers & Accessories

item.description: This stainless steel can tapper is double sided to perform multiple tasks. The perforated strainer catches the seeds and other remnants while allowing the juice to pass through into the bowl underneath. Remove the top half and pour the juice out with the tapered spout. The screw top lid provides easy access to refill and clean the insulated server. Equipped with a push-button top, pouring drinks is safe and easy. These servers include color coded tags that latch onto the bottom of the handle to distinguish among regular coffee, decaf coffee and tea, eliminating confusion when using multiple servers. Ideal for serving beverages at dinner parties or a large brunch, this insulated server is an essential piece in any host's kitchen toolbox.

item.title: 33 Oz. Coffee French Press
item.description: Get the most out of the precious coffee bean and create a smooth, flavorful cup of coffee every time with the French press. Held by a stainless steel frame and equipped with a cool to touch handle, the glass carafe brews up to four cups of coffee. Tea lovers can also use the French press to brew their loose leaf teas without worrying about any remnants in their cup.

item.title: 20 Oz. Stainless Steel Frothing Pitcher
item.description: Be your own barista! Craft specialty coffee drinks at home with this stainless steel frothing pitcher, perfect for frothing milk or making fancy hot chocolate. Constructed from stainless steel, this frothing pitcher will resist rust and corrosion and will not chemical react to acidic food. The ergonomic handle is easy to hold and keeps hands a safe distance from the hot pitcher. Wow your guests by creating latte artwork with the help of the tapered spout.

item.title: 33 Oz. Stainless Steel Frothing Pitcher
item.description: Cafe inspired, this frothing pitcher is a barista's best friend. With a generous capacity of 33 ounces, you can make lattes for a crowd or brew after dinner beverages for all of your dinner guests. A tapered spout allows the user to effortlessly pour without dripping and to create latte artwork. The ergonomically designed handle protects the hand from the hot pitcher and allows for easy transportation. The stainless steel construction resists rust and corrosion and will not chemically react with acidic foods, perfect for outdoor use.

item.title: 32 Oz. Break-Free Clear BPA-Free Plastic Water Pitchers, 4 Pack
item.description: An everyday serving piece that you will rely on time and time again, this BPA-Free plastic water pitcher makes for a great serving piece to serve water, ice tea and lemonade. Fill a pitcher of your favorite cocktail and conveniently keep it within arm's reach at the table for guests to enjoy. Made from break resistant plastic, this pitcher is more durable than a glass pitcher and can be easily passed around with its lightweight design. The contoured ice-control lip allows for easy handling and reduces spilling. Featuring an ergonomic handle, the plastic water pitcher is easy to carry and pour, and is perfect for serving drinks at any party.

item.title: 1/2 L Flip Top Plastic Decanter
item.description: Elevate your early afternoon brunch by serving mimosas in this elegant decanter. Featuring a flip top lid, the decanter makes pouring drinks an easy, mess-free task. Crafted from a durable plastic, the decanter will resist breaking and chipping if dropped or knocked over. This shapely bottle can be used to serve a variety of drinks such as wine, juice, milk or iced coffee. Available in three different sizes to suit your needs, this crystal clear decanter is designed to complement any decor.

item.title: Cast Aluminum Cheese Slicer with Stainless Steel Wire
item.description: Slice perfect slivers of parmesan cheese to sprinkle on top of pasta with this cast aluminum cheese slicer. With an adjustable stainless steel wire and 5" wide blade, you can seamlessly cut thick or thin slices of cheese. Ideal for semi-hard to hard cheese, create a beautifully uniformed cheese platter that is sure to impress your most distinguishing guests with this handy cheese slicer.

item.title: Stainless Steel Cheese Plane with Non-Slip Soft Grip Handle
item.description: Use this cheese plane to create delicately thin slices of parmesan cheese to top off arugula salad or pair it as a serving piece with your Gouda or Gruyere. Featuring a wide blade, this cheese plane slices through semi-firm or firm cheese with ease Crafted to meet the standards of an industrial kitchen, the blade has a sharpened upper edge to create precise slices. With its stainless steel construction, the blade of this cheese plane resists rust and corrosion, and will not chemically react to acidic food. item.title: Ergonomic Soft-Grip Cheese Grater with 1.5 mm Small Holes
item.description: This grater is the proper tool to use when grating cheese for pizza or rasping garlic for sauteing. This grater features fine course grater holes that are sharpened to enhance its quality and speed. Crafted from commercial-grade stainless steel, this grater is rust and corrosion resistant and will not chemically react with acidic food, perfect for zesting lemons and limes. For added strength and durability, this grater features a wire frame to resist bending. Rest the rubber notched end on a bowl or pot to conveniently grate ingredients directly into the container. Ergonomically designed, the non-slip handle fits comfortably in the palm of the hand and reduces hand strain. For easy access, use the hole on the handle to hang the grater with your other essential kitchen tools.
item.g:product_type: Kitchen Tools > Prep Tools > Graters & Peelers

The grating blade is made of commercial-grade stainless steel and reinforced with a wire frame for added strength and resistance to rust, corrosion and bending. The ergonomically designed, non-slip handle fits comfortably in the palm your hand and reduces straining of your wrist.
item.g:product_type: Kitchen Tools > Prep Tools > Graters & Peelers

item.title: #6 (5-1/2 Oz.) White One-Piece Deluxe Ice Cream Scoop / Disher
item.description: An essential for every kitchen, this ice cream disher perfects the task of portioning and simplify the art of cooking. Designed for consistent portioning of soft foods such as applesauce, mashed potatoes, meatballs, or steamed vegetables, this scoop will divide foods into uniform quantities. It can also be used to portion muffin batter and scoop chocolate truffles, cookie dough, or soft ice cream. Featuring a one-piece handle construction with a reinforced 18/10 stainless steel rod and bowl, this disher offers long-lasting durability. The longer grooved handle and easy-to-operate, quick-release thumb press provide a secure grip for comfortable use, helping to reduce hand and arm fatigue. Offered in nine different sizes, this disher is a great portion-control tool with color coded handles to indicate the size of each scoop, making it easier to identify one for your exact cooking needs.

item.title: Round Stainless Steel Potato Ricer
item.description: Get ultra smooth potatoes easily using this classic round potato ricer. Faster and more effective than using a potato masher, this ricer will allow you to control the texture to create a velvety, lump free mash. Constructed from commercial-grade stainless steel, it consists of a shallow cylindrical basket featuring small perforated holes and is set into a handle. There is a second handle connected by a hinge to the first, with a corresponding plunger that forces potatoes through the holes, creating long strands of potato without lumps and irregularities. A simple yet transformative tool, some novel uses for this potato ricer also include pressing seeded tomatoes through the ricer for tomato sauce, pumpkin for pumpkin pie, and baked apples for applesauce.
item.g:product_type: Kitchen Tools > Prep Tools > Kitchen Hand Tools

item.title: Apple Corer with Ergonomic Handle
item.description: Make quick and convenient work of apples for baking with this apple corer. It features a black non-slip handle for a sturdy and comfortable grip and a serrated, stainless steel coring blade for efficient coring. This apple corer is a versatile tool that can be used not only for coring apples, but for removing the center out of cupcakes to fill with cream. It also works on other fruit like pears and pineapples just as well. For added convenience, this apple corer is dishwasher safe.
item.g:product_type: Kitchen Tools > Specialty Tools > Fruit Tools

item.title: Zester/Lemon Peeler with Ergonomic Handle
item.description: Produce long, thin strands of lemon zest to add flavoring to salad dressings, baked goods, and more with this lemon zester peeler. This zester features a black non-slip handle for a soft and comfortable grip and a curved stainless steel metal end with a top that consists of a row of tiny perforated round cutting holes with sharpened rims to create slim strings of peel. The zest is cut from the pith into ribbons, releasing one from each hole. Ideal for removing zest from lemons and other citrus fruits, this peeler is a great tool that every kitchen drawer should have.
item.g:product_type: Kitchen Tools > Prep Tools > Graters & Peelers

item.title: Melon Baller with Ergonomic Handle
item.description: Create a delicious fruit salad or a make a big bowl of melon balls with this melon baller. It features a black non-slip handle for a safe and comfortable grip and a stainless steel scoop that is attached to the handle. A handy kitchen gadget, this melon baller is designed to scoop melon flesh out to make small, perfectly shaped melon balls to use for beautiful melon ball presentations at parties and dinner events. For added convenience, this melon baller is easy to clean and dishwasher-safe.
item.g:product_type: Kitchen Tools > Specialty Tools > Fruit Tools

item.title: Pineapple Corer
item.description: Peel, core, and cut fresh pineapple with efficiency and ease using this pineapple corer. This pineapple corer removes pineapples from their shells leaving the shells fully intact, allowing you to use the shells as bowls to present fruit salads uniquely. Crafted from heavy-duty stainless steel featuring a black ergonomic handle for a smooth and comfortable non-slip grip, this pineapple corer is durable and easy to use. For added convenience and easy cleaning, the handle contains a release button that offers quick disassembly.
item.g:product_type: Kitchen Tools > Specialty Tools > Fruit Tools

item.title: Stainless Steel Tomato Stem Corers, 12 Pack
item.description: A great asset to your kitchen, this tomato stem corer will allow you to core several fruits and vegetables with ease. Twice as fast as and safer than a paring knife, this handy prep tool will save you time and help take the hassle out of coring tomatoes. Equipped with sharp serrated teeth, this corer will quickly and conveniently remove the stem from tomatoes, potatoes, cucumbers, onions, strawberries, and more. Its stainless steel construction offers a lifetime of use.
item.g:product_type: Kitchen Tools > Specialty Tools > Fruit Tools

item.title: Double-Sided Melon Baller
item.description: Create smooth, round melon balls for eye-pleasing salads and fancy fruit platters using this double-scoop melon baller. Featuring a sophisticated wooden handle with two different sized chrome-plated steel scoopers on each end, it is classic and easy to use. Simpler than using a knife, it works well on more than just melons and can be used for coring apples, strawberries, cucumbers and other fruits and vegetables to achieve the perfect portions for your plates. This tool is also great for creating small, colorful scoops of sorbet for a fancy dessert tray or for your next casual function.
item.g:product_type: Kitchen Tools > Specialty Tools > Fruit Tools

item.title: Plastic Lettuce Knife, 11-1/2"
item.description: Give your kitchen a vibrant pop of color with this green lettuce knife. Crafted from durable plastic, this rust and corrosion-resistant knife will prevent lettuce from turning brown and keep it crisp by eliminating tearing. The serrated edges are also ideal for cutting fruits and slicing bagels, brownies, bread, and cakes. A versatile tool, this lettuce knife comes in handy for several kitchen tasks and is safe for use on non-stick cookware. For easy cleanup, this knife is dishwasher safe.
item.g:product_type: Kitchen Tools > Prep Tools > Food Prep
Kitchen Tools > Prep Tools > Kitchen Hand Tools

item.title: Aluminum Alloy Garlic Press
item.description: No more sticky garlic and lingering odors on your hands! This metal garlic press will allow you to apply garlic to your foods without leaving the strong smell on your fingers. Crafted from aluminum alloy, it is sturdy and durable. If you love garlic in every bite, this garlic press is a handy tool for creating evenly minced garlic that is much smaller than you could get by hand and also useful for times when you need to crush a lot of garlic simultaneously. Whether you are crushing garlic into your salad bowl or frying pan, it is great to have this garlic press readily accessible for making quick work of a few garlic cloves.
item.g:product_type: Kitchen Tools > Specialty Tools > Garlic & Herb Tools

item.title: Stainless Steel Shrimp Peeler/Deveiner with Ergonomic Grip Handle
item.description: Clean up your seafood presentations and please your guests by removing shrimp veins with this handy shrimp deveiner. Crafted from stainless steel, it features a curved, pointed blade tip that matches the curve of the shrimp to grab and pull out the shrimp
item.g:product_type: Kitchen Tools > Specialty Tools > Seafood Tools

item.title: Aluminum Shrimp Deveiners, 2 Pack
item.description: A faster and safer alternative to a knife, this aluminum shrimp deveiner makes deveining shrimp a breeze. Crafted from lightweight aluminum and designed to comfortably fit your hand, this deveiner features a curved, pointed blade tip that follows the natural shape of shrimp, offering easy grabbing of the shrimp's veins to pull them out in one effortless motion.
item.g:product_type: Kitchen Tools > Specialty Tools > Seafood Tools

item.title: Zinc Alloy Lobster Cracker
item.description: Spend less time cracking lobster shells and more time enjoying the meat inside them with this 6" lobster cracker. Constructed from heavy-duty zinc alloy, this double-jaw device is also great for shellfish, oysters, and crab shells. Breaking shells can be difficult, but this tool's lobster claw-like shape and jagged ridges will prepare you to take on even the most stubborn shells. The smooth handle provides a firm and comfortable grip, making it simple to crack several types of seafood and all of your favorite nuts.
item.g:product_type: Kitchen Tools > Specialty Tools > Seafood Tools

item.title: 1 Oz. One-Piece Yellow Vinyl-Coated Stainless Steel Ladle
item.description: The perfect tool for both home cooks and professional chefs alike, this one-piece ladle is a great go-to item that makes serving liquids and sauces a breeze. Crafted from durable commercial-grade stainless steel that can withstand frequent use, it features a long rubbery non-slip handle for a smooth and comfortable grip and a deep bowl at the bottom of the handle that holds a 1-ounce capacity. The handle is color-coded in yellow for easy identification to keep portion sizes consistent. This ladle will help keep your countertop and stovetop free of soup and sauce drips and can be conveniently nested on a pot's rim or hung on a rack. Available in a variety of sizes with different colored handles, the smaller sizes are used for sauces and condiments and the larger sizes are used for soups or punches.

With a handle on each side, carrying this tray from room to room to serve guests coffee, tea and desserts is easily done. The mirror-finish and ornate design work well as a serving tray for breakfast in bed or as a decorative piece for your vanity.

item.title: Chrome Round 14" Serving Tray
item.description: Set your fine crystal spirit decanter and coordinating glasses on this elegant round serving tray. This serving tray will elevate any event with its sophisticated embossed center and gadroon edge. For prolonged use with meats or acidic foods, pair this tray with a doily, tableware linen or glassware linen to protect the high polished mirror-finish. A versatile tray, use it to display your fine bone china or to decorate your vanity.

item.title: Hollow Handle 11-3/4" Stainless Steel Notched Serving Spoon
item.description: Great for foods like spaghetti, linguine, and angel hair pasta, this sleekly designed spoon provides a handy convenience when trying to catch, hold, and serve long strands of pasta. Featuring notches for grabbing and gripping, it successfully lends itself to mess-free and simple servings. Use it as a serving piece for several occasions including parties, banquets, and buffets. Crafted from brushed satin-finish stainless steel featuring a thick handle for increased comfort and grip, this notched spoon offers portions with elegance and ease. Its hollow handle construction makes it lightweight enough for convenient usage and handling for any application.

item.title: Hollow Handle 11-3/4" Stainless Steel Slotted Serving Spoon
item.description: Ideal for a variety of uses, this 11-3/4" slotted spoon is great for serving all sorts of hot and cold items and removing foods from plates to keep them dry and free of aggravating messes. An essential utensil when preparing foods such as pasta, oatmeal, stews, fried foods, or other similar items, it features slots in the base of the spoon to allow liquid to pass through while preserving the larger solid foods on top. Constructed of durable stainless steel with a brushed-satin finish, its thick handle offers a strong, comfortable grip, making it easy to clean and easy to use. Featuring a hollow handle construction, this slotted spoon is lightweight, allowing for convenient usage and handling.

item.title: Hollow Handle 11-3/4" Stainless Steel Solid Serving Spoon
item.description: One look at this stylishly crafted solid spoon will grab the attention of your guests. Hollow-handled and balanced, it provides a comfortable grip and the lighter weight makes it easier to handle while serving foods. Constructed from commercial-grade brushed-satin finish stainless steel, this spoon combines a classic presentation with a functional design that offers tremendous table appeal, making it just as useful in the kitchen as it is elegant for tableside servings.

item.title: Hollow Handle 11" Stainless Steel Pot Fork
item.description: Turn your barbecue ribs on the grill and serve up tasty slices of meat with this professional quality 11" two-tine pot fork. Its thick handle offers a sturdy, comfortable grip when serving turkey, roast beef, and other meats. Featuring a brushed satin-finish stainless steel design for several applications, this fork is useful for various occasions ranging from casual dinners to gourmet dining. It can also be used for finger food servings, fruit tables, salad mixing, and more. With its hollow handle design, this fork is lightweight enough for convenient usage and handling.

item.title: Hollow Handle 10" Stainless Steel Cold Meat Fork
item.description: Perfect for casual or formal entertaining, this cold meat fork is an essential utensil for serving cuts of cold meats and textured cheeses on simple or fancy trays. Made of sleek and stylish brushed satin-finish stainless steel and equipped with flat, pointed tines to spear and lift foods, this utensil is durably constructed to last through extensive use and achieve smoother servings. Additionally, this fork is great for serving French toast, waffles, and sliced vegetables. A versatile piece, it can also be used to lift heavy things out of a crock pot or to transport foods from a baking pan onto a serving platter. With its hollow handle design, this fork is lightweight enough for convenient usage and handling regardless of the application.

item.title: Hollow Handle 11" Stainless Steel Pie Server
item.description: Impress your guests with a piece of pie using this elegantly crafted 11" pie server. Constructed from commercial-grade stainless steel, it features a thick, solid handle that offers a comfortable grip and an angled blade to serve a variety of foods from pizza to pastries with ease. This pastry server presents a clean, sophisticated look that works well with any decor and is perfect for getting under the edges of pizzas, pies, and cakes, making it a great addition to any chef's kitchen. With an attractive brushed satin-finish and featuring a hollow handle construction, this pie server is lightweight enough for convenient usage and handling.

item.title: Hollow Handle Stainless Steel 11-1/2" Pie Server
item.description: An elegant serving piece ideal for pizza, pies, cakes, and tarts, this wide pie server is an essential utensil for any baker. Shaped similarly to the wedge of a pie, use it to cut several foods into slices or sections for precise servings. Crafted from brushed-satin finish stainless steel, this pie spade features a triangular smooth-edge blade with two longer sides and a narrower bottom. Attached to the blade is a lightweight hollow handle, which makes it easy to grip and properly position the blade to slide under the wedge of a pie for a smooth and even cut of your favorite foods.

item.title: Hollow Handle 4 Oz. Stainless Steel Deep Ladle
item.description: Ideal for serving delicious soups, sides, and much more, this deep-bowled ladle is a versatile tool for any food aficionado. An essential item in any baker's kitchen, this plate is available in two sizes and can be used for a range of things from baking goods to reheating items. Crafted from lightweight aluminum, this pie plate heats and cools quickly and generates even heat distribution for better baking, making it an optimal choice for baking pies.

item.title: 12 Cup (3 Oz. / Cup) Non-Stick Aluminum Muffin Pan, 14" x 11"
item.description: Create cupcakes, muffins, and small cakes for your guests with this lightweight 12-cup muffin pan. Made from commercial-grade aluminum, this pan provides superior heat conductivity for desserts to rise and bake evenly and is resistant to many forms of corrosion. Grease and flour the stick-resistant surface of the cup-shaped cavities to help ensure the seamless removal of baked goods without the nuisance of batter sticking to the bottom of the pan. This 12-count muffin pan is also available in a 24-count for your convenience.

item.title: Deluxe Carbon Steel Professional Non-Stick 12 Cup (3 Oz. / Cup) Muffin Pan
item.description: Treat your guests to mouthwatering cupcakes, muffins, or mini pies with this versatile 12-cup muffin pan. Perfect for on-the-go breakfast and healthy protein-filled frittatas, this pan contains compartments for baking up to twelve items at once. It features a non-stick coating that will reduce cooking oil usage, minimize corrosion, and permit easy release and clean up. Crafted from tin-plated commercial-grade carbon steel, this pan offers superior heat transfer and maintains both very low and high and temperatures. Its durable construction will have a long life in any kitchen.

item.title: Deluxe Carbon Steel Professional Non-Stick 6 Cup (7 Oz. / Cup) Jumbo Muffin Pan
item.description: Treat your guests to jumbo-sized mouthwatering cupcakes, muffins, or mini pies with this jumbo muffin pan. This pan contains compartments for baking up to six desserts at once. It features a non-stick coating that will reduce cooking oil usage, minimize corrosion, and permit easy release and clean up. Crafted from tin-plated commercial-grade carbon steel, it offers superior heat transfer. Its durable construction will have a long life in any kitchen.

item.title: Professional Carbon Steel Non-Stick 12 Cup (3/4 Oz. / Cup) Mini Muffin Pan
item.description: Create bite-sized treats with the mini muffin pan. Bake miniature muffins for a lady luncheon or itty-bitty cupcakes for a school bake sale. Constructed from carbon steel, this miniature muffin pan will heat up quickly, cutting down on baking time. With the non-stick coating, muffins, cupcakes and scones can be easily released from the pan. item.title: Professional Carbon Steel Non-Stick 24 Cup (1-1/2 Oz. / Cup) Mini Muffin Pan
item.description: Pop muffins fresh out the oven using this 24-cup classic mini muffin pan. This pan is also great for making appetizers, cupcakes, chocolates, and brownies, allowing you to bake up to twenty-four individual items at a time. Crafted from carbon steel featuring a non-stick surface, it is harder and more durable than aluminum and prevents materials from sticking to it. This muffin pan offers excellent heat transfer properties and achieves both very low and high temperatures, making it a highly efficient and versatile cooking piece that is essential to any baker.

item.description: Create sweet and delicate confections with these three cake decorating tip sets. The 26 and 52 piece sets consist of a standard coupler and metal flower nail for designing roses. All sets come in a plastic case for convenient organization and storage of tips and tools. With a tremendous collection of tips, these sets will have you crafting cakes like a pro baker in no time.
